mapper.delete: delete FROM geek_hot_index_new where date > date_add(DATE_FORMAT( #{strYYMMDD}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval -3 day) and date < date_add(DATE_FORMAT( #{strYYMMDD}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)
delete FROM geek_hot_index_new where date <date_add(DATE_FORMAT( CURRENT_DATE(), '%Y-%m-%d'), interval -7 day)
mapper.update: create table view_geek_hot_index_new as SELECT a.classification,a.product_id,c.NAME,c.name_tko,c.level,c.parent_category_id,a.avg_rank,b.rank, b.rank - a.avg_rank AS change_rank,b.title,b.create_time,b.create_by,b.update_by,b.update_time from (SELECT product_id,classification,name,name_tko,avg(rank) as avg_rank FROM geek_hot_index_new GROUP BY product_id) a LEFT JOIN (select * from geek_hot_index_new where date=date_add(DATE_FORMAT( CURRENT_DATE(), '%Y-%m-%d'), interval -1 day)) b on a.product_id=b.product_id LEFT JOIN geek_category c on c.category_id=a.classification
